Title: Biden gov't has not recognized N. Korea as nuclear power: White H...

Title: Wealthy nations fail to agree curbs on fossil fuel finance

Title: Gaza ceasefire deal close after 'breakthrough' in Doha

Title: Acting president condemns N. Korea's latest missile provocation

However, she said the move would depend on Syria's new rulers carrying out an inclusive political transition after last month’s overthrow of President Bashar Assad.

Description: President Joe Biden is set to ban new offshore oil and gas development across 625 million acres (250 million hectares) of U.S. coastal territory, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.

Title: Apple to pay $95 million to settle lawsuit accusing Siri of eaves...

The gunman, identified by police as Aleksandar Martinovic, 45, attempted suicide near his home in the town of Cetinje after being cornered by police.
